['Q1', '2025'].answer: a16cceb90d1c689f9743decf37096316 --> By the time we end this year it will be closer to 20% kind of number or lower.

['Q3', '2024'].answer: 31f2c9cb06afd15198367ed526a23d98 --> Looking ahead, we see many opportunities to drive risk calibrated profitable growth. We believe our focus on customer 360, extensive franchise and collaboration within the organisation, backed by our digital offerings, process improvements and service delivery initiatives will enable us to deliver holistic solutions to customers in a seamless manner and grow market share across key segments. We will continue to make investments in technology, people, distribution and building our brand. We will remain focused on maintaining a strong balance sheet with prudent provisioning and healthy levels of capital. The principles of “Return of Capital”, “Fair to Customer, Fair to Bank” and “One Bank, One Team, One RoE” will continue to guide our operations. We remain focused on delivering consistent and predictable returns to our shareholders.
